*** EUHH. I TOOK THE TIME TO RE-READ THIS. A PIRATE MANGA.
"ROMANCE DAWN". THIS WAS THE START OF THE WORLD OF “ONE
PIECE". THE FOUNDER, SO TO SPEAK. EVEN THOUGH THERE WERE
SOME CHATTERING MARKS, THIS WAS REALLY NOSTALGIC, BUT
ANYWAY, IT WAS A GOOD READ. YES YES.

***AS YOU ALL MAY HAVE NOTICED, THEY ARE SIMILAR. THE SHANKS
REMINISCENCE. I BELIEVE I WAS 21 WHEN I FINISHED THIS PIECE.
THAT WAS ABOLIT ONE YEAR BEFORE THE SERIALIZATION OF ONE
PIECE. I HAD ALREADY DECIDED ON LUFFY'S STRAW HAT “EPISODE”
AND COMING UP WITH SOMETHING ALTERNATIVE WAS FAR FROM MY
MIND.

***HOWEVER, HALF A YEAR LATER, I WAS ALREADY WRITING A
SECOND "ROMANCE DAWN”. THAT WAS IN MY COLLECTION OF SHORT
STORIES, “WANTED!” BLIT IN THAT STORY, LUFFY RECEIVED HIS STRAW
HAT FROM HIS GRANDFATHER. EVEN THOUGH I HAD ALREADY DECIDED
ON THE SHANKS EPISODE, I WAS STARTING TO TALK ABOUT A
GRANDFATHER. WEIRD, HUH?

***ODA-SAN'S CONSPIRACY - THE ROMANCE DAWN WITH THE EPISODE
I HAD DECIDED ON WAS PLIT IN THE WRONG MAGAZINE. THE ROMANCE

DAWN IN THIS BOOK FIRST APPEARED IN JUMP’S SPECIAL ISSUE, THE
MAGAZINE FOR NEW COMER MANGAKAS TO ENTER THE WORLD OF
SERIALIZATION. THE ROMANCE DAWN I WROTE AFTERWARDS WAS
PUBLISHED IN JUMP’S REGULAR ISSUE, WEEKLY SHOLINEN JUMP. IN
OTHER WORDS, THE EXISTENCE OF THE CHARACTER “SHANKS” WAS
NEVER MADE KNOWN TO THE READERS OF THE REGULAR JUMP
MAGAZINE. AFTER ALL, BY THE TIME ONE PIECE BECAME SERIALIZED,
THE IMPACT HAD ALREADY DISAPPEARED. WHAT A CHEEKY NEW
COMER.

***FINALLY, REGARDING THE "ADULT LUFFY” ON THE LAST PAGE. I
HAD ALREADY DECIDED ON ONE PIECE’S LUFFY, AND I WASN'T SURE
WHETHER I COULD MAKE THAT CIRCLIMSTANCE COME TO BE OR NOT.
EVEN NOW I AM NOT SURE. THE ADVENTURE IS STILL GOING ON.

*% A pirate manga. | first started drawing pirate manga back when |
was in 7th grade. | didnt know anything about draft paper, pen, or
how to draw manga properly, so | was drawing this manga on a
piece of paper with a pencil. Back then | also played soccer and en-
joyed being in a “team: so | started to incorporate this into my
long-time favorite genre: pirates. But then, the ideal had for a
“Pirates Adventures’ was huge, and | realized that | wouldut be able
to finish drawing it in one notebook. | realized that drawing a pirate
story for a one-shot is impossible, so | thought: “I'll leave the pirates
alone until | start my serialization in Jump" (<- Decided.)

£% And so, this is the manga | drew to show my “eagerness’ for the

serialization. fo tell you the truth, | also drew another "Romance
Dawn" before this one, but because of the limitation on the number
of pages, | couldnt fit it in here. | didut put the first one here because
it was too much of a prototype for “One Piece? which means, | used
a lot of points from that one shot to draw “One Piece’ so li rather
put something that’s quite different: this "Romance Dawn: I'll
probably share "the other Romance Vawn'' in One Piece or something
when the time comes.

3% By the way, after two one-shots about pirates, I resiqned from
being an assistant for Watsuki Nobuhiro-senseis “Rurouni Kenshin’
and started to-hump- take action for my serialization in JUMP.
